## Tile.removeTextElement() method

Removes a \[\[TextElement\]\] from this `Tile`<!-- -->. For the element to be removed successfully, the priority of the \[\[TextElement\]\] has to be equal to its priority when it was added.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeTextElement(textElement: TextElement): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  textElement | [TextElement](./harp-mapview.textelement.md) | The TextElement to remove. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the TextElement has been removed successfully; `false` otherwise.
